content: I like logic puzzles and I can set this one to my own level. I've played this for years and thought it was time to pay the author for his work
Love it... Makes your mind work...but lately have trouble bringing up a game. Finished one stays there...
So fun!

Love this game! Not sure why I never rated it. I've been playing it multiple times per day for years. It's really quite simplistic but challenging and different every time. I love having to use deductive reasoning to solve each puzzle
Thanks for rapid response to my query all is well ðŸ¤—
replyContent: Two things: 1) You didn't allow "storage" access. Check SETTINGS-APPS-SherlockZen-Permissions, make sure STORAGE is ON. 2) You may have a device that fails even with the permissions on. It was hard to find (had to buy a new device), but I've JUST found a fix. New release coming after I look at another problem, hopefully within a couple of days.

content: PLEASE fix the Samsung issue soon! I have an ASUS and have tried the fix you wrote for Samsung people in the reviews. It works, but, I have to do it everyday. I have been playing Sherlock every night for over 10 years. I am lost. Waaah... Hopefully the new version will work for my black screen also.
replyContent: I doubt that the new 1.5.6 version will fix the black screen problem that some folks are seeing, but I'm working with one person who IS seeing the "black screen" problem to try to track down what might be going on. It's hard to type, though, with my fingers crossed...

content: Stopped working after last update... Fix this! Update: got a fast response from publisher and it's working again! This is my go to game for waiting so i am glad to have it again.
replyContent: Try: 1) Uninstall game. 2) Power-down device (Hold power button). 3) Power-up device. 4) reinstall Game. 5) Run game, tap MORE twice, then SELECT PUZZLE. 6) Enter 110522 and GO!. 7) Close dialog and exit game. 8) Try to run game again. If it doesn't work, email me at everett@kaser.com.

content: Love this game. I bought Sherlock Zen and have been playing it for weeks. Unfortunately, all of a sudden it won't open. Not sure what the problem is. It was working fine earlier today but not now. I don't see an option to refresh - only to uninstall, but if I uninstall it will I have to buy it again? I tried turning the tablet off and on, but that made no difference. I'd be grateful for any suggestions. One suggestion I would make is it would be good if there were more than one female face.
replyContent: Send me an email at everett@kaser.com, along with more details, such as what you do (or don't) see when you try to run it, etc. Review replies are too small to work through issues that aren't terribly "clean-cut."

content: I love this game. I have been playing it on a Galaxy Tab S2 for months. Installed the Jan 1 update, and now it won't even start. Just a black screen. Hopefully a fix is coming soon. Update: the fix below worked like a champ!
replyContent: This seems to be particular to Samsung devices. Try: 1) Uninstall game. 2) Power-down device (Hold power button). 3) Power-up device. 4) reinstall Game. 5) Run game, tap MORE twice, then SELECT PUZZLE. 6) Enter 110522 and GO!. 7) Close dialog and exit game. 8) Try to run game again. If it doesn't work, email me at everett@kaser.com.

content: Endless combinations of logic
Great brain exercise. Played for years on PC and am very glad to find it on Android. Excellent logic game!

I just purchased Zen, but the install process did not put an inon on the screen. I tried to open it from the store again, but it just took me to the free version. Can someone tell me how to resolve this problem? Later. The problem was resolved. Thanks for the help. I am a huge fan of this game. I especially like that I could purchase it instead of leasing, as so many games want.
replyContent: If the game is installed successfully, then the icon will show on your "all apps" screen (how to get to that varies between devices). You should be able to drag it from there to your 'home' screens. If you need more help, please email everett@kaser.com for a lengthier discussion.

content: I have had versions back to Win 3.1! Was really excited to find this as a mobile app. Been playing mobile version for a couple of years now and still love it!!!

Great puzzle game. Takes a while to master, and the techniques you employ change as you move up to bigger puzzles. After a while you can deduce a lot more based on the clues and do less of a process of elimination and more of actual deduction based on the logic behind the clues. For example, two clues show that the orange is adjacent to both the red house and the green house. There isn't a clue pointing this out and the hints won't tell you this, but its enough to know it isn't on the edges.
Great fun!
Settings are not saved when I close the app. Also, it starts with same puzzle every time whether I have completed it or not. UPDATE - the suggestion from Mr. Kaiser solved the problem. Thanks
replyContent:
To save the current puzzle number, the game must write its config info to a file.  Maybe the 'storage' permission was denied during at first?

Run the SETTINGS app, tap on APPS, then the SHERLOCK app.  Does it show "storage" as ON under 'permissions?'
If not, tap on permissions and turn "storage" ON.

Let me know if that's the case or not?

content: I've been playing this game since the 90s and was so excited to find this as an Android app. I love this game!!! I've introduced it to my son and now he's hooked too. I'm also glad that the graphics look pretty much the same they did on my old PC version. ðŸ¥°

This is a great logic game and I have enjoyed it for years. I was very excited to see it modified for this small screen format. The UI choices make it easy to play on the go :) The only thing I wish were different in this version is if it had a darker set of images to use or a way to apply a custom set. It was easy enough to swap an alternate into play in Windows, and I used to use one so I could enjoy the puzzles for longer.
replyContent: It IS possible. There are four image sets built in, which can be selected in the OPTIONS dialog. Also, it's possible to replace (override) one of the built-in sets with a set of your devising (provising? :-). Send me an email at everett@kaser.com and I can send you specific directions on how to do it.

content: Expand your mind
Awesome game.
I have been playing this game for years and still enjoy the challenge it offers.
replyContent: You probably denied "storage access" when installing. It needs that to save it's config info. Go to SETTINGS-APPS-Sherlock ZEN-Permissions and turn on "Storage" permission. Then the game will be able to remember your player setup information and which puzzles you've solved and which one you're on in each size.

content: I've been playing this game for years, challenging and fun to play.
Fun, intellectually stimulating. No ads, no spyware.
LOVE THIS GAME!!! Please make a more difficult version! Irregardless i still LOVE this game??
Classic. It has a very intuitive interface for the classic logic problems.

A great logic game that I have been playing since the early 1990s. Over the years I've played this on Windows PC (early to mid 90s), iPhone and iPad, as well as android phones and tablets! No need for flash graphics, no need for complicated instructions. The game is so intuitive, and actually self-explanatory, if you have a logical brain, of course. I just love it!
I used to play this on my parents computer years ago. Love it. Finished the free version in a couple of days so i had to buy the zen. Worth every penny.

I love these logic games. I have the PC version that I bought years ago and was exited to see the mobile version. I have it on my phone and my tablet now. Honeycomb too. I'm hoping to see Watson's Map and Moriarty soon!!!
I used to play this game with my kids years ago. It's nice to have it again.
Great logic puzzle pastime.
Timeless. Intuitive and addictive. It's a classic for a reason.
Been playing this game for 20 years and it's nice to have a mobile version now.
Very happy with recent upgrade. Speedy and fixed tiny problem on my new tablet. Thanks

I have loved this game for more years than I can remember. I'm so glad to see it in Android. The only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5  is there are occasional glitches in gameplay. Also, for me there is one problem. I have a bit of a visual problem that makes it extremely difficult to distinguish yellow from white. This causes me a lot of wrong answers from risreading clues. I still love Sherlock, though.
replyContent: Drop me an email at everett@kaser.com and I can send you instructions on how you can modify the built-in graphics to change either the yellow or white to a color that works better for you (assuming you can use a rudimentary graphics editor to edit a .PNG file, and move the file onto your device).

content: Loved it in the 90s. Still love it. Very glad I was able to find it again.

I like the game, I had the did version years ago. However, there is a glitch only Android HTC m9, there is no way to save the games and scores once the programme is closed. So I have to remember which game I last played and have no record of progress. Otherwise I would've rated 5 stars.
replyContent:
To save the current puzzle#, the game has to write its 
configuration information to a file.  Perhaps the 'storage' permission 
was denied during the initial run?

Try running the SETTINGS app, then tap on APPS, then tap on the
SHERLOCK ZEN app.  Does it show "storage" as ON under 'permissions?'
If not, tap on permissions and turn "storage" ON.

content: Would get 5 when you'll solve the prob with Android Oreo. Other than that, amazing game
Fondly remembered from the DOS days, and here it is on tablet. Absolutely faithful to the original. Now I know why I bought a tablet!
In all ASCOM.
Started with Sherlock around Win 3.1 or early Win 95. Rebuilt old hardware once just so we could keep running it. Absolutely love the faithful migration to tablet. Made my week finding this here.
This is such a well done throwback to the good old DOS days. Excellent brain tickler.
Have loved this game since the 3.1 years keep it going.  Would like to see a nature based theme. Leaves, animals, shells etc.
Thank you so much for making this available for Android! It's one of my favourite games in the world!
It teaches kids how to think logically in a very fun way.  There are the different levels, so it doesn't get too hard to fast.   It's my go to game on the bus home.
